TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StaticExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现返回静态字段和属性引用的标记扩展。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that returns static field and property references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是适用于 XAML 语言功能的 .NET XAML 服务支持中的 `{x:Static}` 的标记扩展实现。This class is a markup extension implementation for `{x:Static}` in the .NET XAML services support of XAML language features. 有关 XAML 使用情况的信息，请参阅[X:Static 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension). 通常使用静态引用从类型获取静态值，这些类型包括无法在 XAML 中实例化的类型（因为类型为静态）。You typically use static references to obtain static values from types, including from types that cannot be instantiated in XAML because the type is static. `{x:Static}` 有用的常见示例包括可视为常量的值，例如状态的固定数学值或唯一键。Common examples of cases where `{x:Static}` is useful include values that can be thought of as constants, such as fixed math values or unique keys for states. 所引用的静态成员不必来自与 XAML 架构上下文关联的特定框架程序集。The static members being referenced do not have to come from specific framework assemblies associated with XAML schema context. 可以映射其他程序集和 CLR 命名空间，以供 XAML 使用，然后可以使用所映射的前缀在 XAML 中引用类型的静态成员。You can map other assemblies and CLR namespaces for XAML usage and then can refer to static members of types in XAML using the prefix you mapped.

span.span: x:Static Markup Extension

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string member) cil managed

param.name: member
param.span: 用于标识要引用的成员的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the member to make a reference to.

param.span: 此字符串使用格式 prefix:typeName.fieldOrPropertyName。

span.span: This string uses the format prefix:typeName.fieldOrPropertyName.

param.span: prefix 是 XAML 命名空间的映射前缀，并且仅用于未映射到默认 XAML 命名空间的引用静态值。

span.span: prefix is the mapping prefix for a XAML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XAML namespace.

summary.span: 使用提供的 字符串初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此值时，不会计算 `member` 值。The `member` value is not evaluated when you set it. 如果未 `null`初始值，则接受值。If the initial value is not `null`,then the value is accepted. `member` 值的实际分析和计算会推迟到 XAML 编写器处理扩展使用时调用 。The actual parsing and evaluation of the `member` value is deferred until is called when a XAML writer processes an extension usage. 此时，XAML 架构上下文会通知类型映射并获得值。At that time, XAML schema context informs the type mapping and the value can be obtained.

span.span: is .
x:Static Markup Extension

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Member { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Member : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于根据服务提供的类型解析程序解析静态字段或属性的成员名称字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a member name string that is used to resolve a static field or property based on the service-provided type resolver.

value.span: 用于标识要引用的成员的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the member to make a reference to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的字符串通常使用格式*前缀*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*。The string for typically uses the format *prefix*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*. （*prefix*是 XML 命名空间的映射前缀，并且仅当引用未映射到默认 XML 命名空间的静态值时才需要。(*prefix* is the mapping prefix for an XML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XML namespace). 除了同时提供 ，该字符串还可以指定成员名称，但请注意，此方法不支持 XML 命名空间和前缀;它在类型系统级别工作。The string can also specify only the member name, so long as is also supplied, but note that this technique will not support XML namespaces and prefixes; it is working at the type system level. 有关 XAML 使用情况的信息，请参阅[X:Static 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension). 设置此值时，不会对其进行计算;只要值不 `null`，就会接受此值。This value is not evaluated when you set it; so long as the value is not `null` it will be accepted. 值的实际分析和计算会推迟，直到在分析期间调用 。The actual parsing and evaluation of the value is deferred until is called during parsing. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML 处理器使用的正常方案下，XAML 处理器会传递 CLR 类型的类型解析程序作为其服务协定的一部分，并在 调用中使用此解析程序。Under the normal scenario of use by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor, the XAML processor passes a type resolver for CLR types as part of its service contract, and this resolver is used on the call.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于定义要返回的静态成员的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that defines the static member to return.

value.span: 用于定义要返回的静态成员的 。

span.span: The that defines the static member to return.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]中， 支持备用模式，这种模式可根据 为简单成员名称和作为 提供的所属类型返回静态成员，而不是 在`.`*成员\*\*的窗体*中提供完整名称。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], supports an alternate mode whereby it can return a static member based on being the simple member name and its owning type supplied as , rather than providing a full name in the form *type*`.`*member*. 类型解析程序仍然起作用，但在这种情况下， 和 基本上组合在一起： `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`。The type resolver still acts, but in this case the and are basically combined: `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`. 请注意，此方法不支持 XAML 命名空间和前缀;它适用于后备类型系统，而不是 XAML 类型系统。Note that this technique will not support XAML namespaces and prefixes; it is working against the backing type system, not the XAML type system. 的字符串通常使用格式*前缀*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*。The string for typically uses the format *prefix*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*. （*prefix*是 XML 命名空间的映射前缀，并且仅当引用未映射到默认 XML 命名空间的静态值时才需要。(*prefix* is the mapping prefix for an XML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XML namespace). 有关 XAML 使用情况的信息，请参阅[X:Static 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可为标记扩展提供服务的对象。

span.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.

param.span: 服务提供商应提供可实现类型解析程序 () 的服务。

span.span: The service provider is expected to provide a service that implements a type resolver ().

summary.span: 返回一个要在应用此扩展的属性上设置的对象值。

span.span: Returns an object value to set on the property where you apply this extension.

summary.span: 对于 ，返回值是针对请求的静态成员所计算的静态值。

span.span: For , the return value is the static value that is evaluated for the requested static member.

returns.span: 要在应用了扩展的属性上设置的静态值。

span.span: The static value to set on the property where the extension is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 XAML 语言功能，通常不应直接调用。This method supports XAML language features and is generally not intended to be called directly. XAML 处理器实现使用此方法在对象创建过程中正确处理 `x:Static` 扩展值。The XAML processor implementation uses this method to correctly handle the `x:Static` extension values during object creation. 此实现依赖于基于传递的 `serviceProvider`的服务。This implementation relies on services that are based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 不得 `null``serviceProvider`。`serviceProvider` must not be `null`. `serviceProvider` 对象应返回 的服务。The `serviceProvider` object is expected to return a service for . 在默认的 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器使用的正常方案下，提供了合适的服务提供程序。Under the normal scenario of use by the default XAML readers and XAML writers, a suitable service provider is available. 无效的 XAML 架构上下文可能会产生中断类型映射的副作用，进而导致 服务。An invalid XAML schema context might have the side effect of breaking type mapping and thus the service. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]中， 支持备用模式，这种模式可根据 为简单成员名称和作为 提供的所属类型返回静态成员，而不是 在`.`*成员\*\*的窗体*中提供完整名称。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], supports an alternate mode whereby it can return a static member based on being the simple member name and its owning type supplied as , rather than providing a full name in the form *type*`.`*member*. 类型解析程序仍然起作用，但在这种情况下， 和 基本上组合在一起： `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`。The type resolver still acts, but in this case the and are basically combined: `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`.

exception.span: 计算时，扩展的 值为 。
